name: v2.4.3.RELEASE
body:
Includes:

 - #472 
 - #466

## What's Changed
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.2.10.RELEASE to 2.2.11.RELEASE by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/394
* Bump embedded-consul from 2.1.4 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/380
* Bump groovy-all from 2.4.12 to 2.4.20 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/398
* Bump hazelcast from 4.0.3 to 4.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/399
* Bump spring-cloud-dependencies from Hoxton.SR8 to Hoxton.SR9 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/400
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.2.11.RELEASE to 2.4.0 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/403
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.0.0.Dev05 to 12.0.0.Dev06 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/401
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.0.0.Dev06 to 12.0.0.Dev07 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/406
* Bump groovy-all from 2.4.20 to 2.4.21 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/407
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.4.0 to 2.4.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/409
* Bump ignite-core from 2.9.0 to 2.9.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/412
* Bump hazelcast from 4.1 to 4.1.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/411
* Bump bucket4j.version from 4.10.0 to 6.0.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/415
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/416
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.0.0.Dev07 to 12.0.0.Final by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/417
* Bump spring-cloud-dependencies from Hoxton.SR9 to Hoxton.SR10 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/418
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.0.0.Final to 12.0.1.Final by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/419
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.4.2 to 2.4.3 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/420
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.0.1.Final to 12.1.0.Dev01 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/421
* Bump commons-net from 3.7.2 to 3.8.0 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/422
* Bump bucket4j.version from 6.0.1 to 6.0.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/424
* Bump hazelcast from 4.1.1 to 4.1.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/425
* Bump ignite-core from 2.9.1 to 2.10.0 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/426
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.4.3 to 2.4.4 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/427
* Bump bucket4j.version from 6.0.2 to 6.2.0 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/428
* Bump hazelcast from 4.1.2 to 4.2 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/429
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.1.0.Dev01 to 12.1.0.Final by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/431
* Bump embedded-consul from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/432
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.1.0.Final to 12.1.1.Final by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/433
* Rollback spring boot 2.4.x to 2.3.x line by @marcosbarbero in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/436
* Bump spring-cloud-dependencies from Hoxton.SR10 to Hoxton.SR11 by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/439
* Upgrade to GitHub-native Dependabot by @dependabot-preview in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/440
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.1.1.Final to 12.1.2.Final by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/442
* Bump jacoco.version from 0.8.6 to 0.8.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/441
* Bump awaitility from 4.0.3 to 4.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/443
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.1.2.Final to 12.1.3.Final by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/444
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.3.10.RELEASE to 2.3.11.RELEASE by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/446
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.1.3.Final to 12.1.4.Final by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/448
* Bump spring-boot-starter-parent from 2.3.11.RELEASE to 2.3.12.RELEASE by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/450
* Fix ignite-core version by @marcosbarbero in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/467
* Fix Consul key when using URL_PATTERN by @Mohamedfawzy1993 in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/466
* Migrate Travis Build by @marcosbarbero in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/469
* Bump infinispan.version from 12.1.4.Final to 13.0.0.Final by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/470
* Bump bucket4j.version from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/464
* Bump hazelcast from 4.2 to 5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/463
* Bump ignite-core from 2.10.0 to 2.11.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/462
* Related to bug no #471 as AbstractCacheRateLimiter is Impacting perfo… by @Mohamedfawzy1993 in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/472

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/442
* @Mohamedfawzy1993 made their first contribution in https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/pull/466

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/compare/v2.4.2.RELEASE...v2.4.3.RELEASE

name: v1.7.6.RELEASE
body: - [Adds support for a header in the key](https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-zuul-ratelimit/commit/777549a5539f6397df263230dd9c1a851e0bf69e)

name: v2.4.0.RELEASE
body:
This version contains breaking changes, it requires:

- bucket4j 4.9.x
- hazelcast 4.x

Adds:
- #299

name: v2.3.0.RELEASE
body:
This release includes:

Features:
  - #284 A more fine-grained way to expose the response headers
  - #281 Support to `java.time.Duration` to configure the `refresh-internal` and the `quota`
  - #260 A way to listen to an event when the rate limit has exceeded

Bug fixes:
  - #279 Fix redis remaining header value
  - #269 Fix redis class casting
  - #263 Fix redis race condition

name: v2.2.0.RELEASE
body:
This new version drops the support for some deprecated properties, check below for more details.

Fixes:
  - #117

name: v2.1.0.RELEASE
body:
Fixes:
  - #113 

This new version no longer has a default `in memory` implementation. It's required to specify which one to be used.

name: v2.0.0.RELEASE
body: * Add support to [Spring Cloud Finchley](https://spring.io/blog/2018/06/19/spring-cloud-finchley-release-is-available), and [Spring Boot 2](https://spring.io/blog/2018/03/01/spring-boot-2-0-goes-ga).

name: v1.5.0.RELEASE
body:
Available in this release
---

- #48 
- #54

## Breaking changes
This release fixes #50 in which is a breaking change. In case you are using JPA storage strategy be aware that the former `key` column is now named `rate_key`.

name: v1.4.0.RELEASE
body:
This release adds:
 - `RateLimiterErrorHandler`
 - New policy management

name: v1.3.3.RELEASE
body: Add quota time option for rate limiting

name: v1.3.2.RELEASE
body: Add `RateLimitKeyGenerator` interface allowing further customization on keys used to the ratelimit access control.

name: v1.3.1.RELEASE
body: Add an __optional__ default rate limit `policy` configuration.

name: v1.1.0.RELEASE
body:
This version adds an `InMemoryRateLimiter` implementation for dev environment.
In order to make `RedisRateLimiter` implementation work now is mandatory to add the following dependency:

```
 <dependency>
     <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
     <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-redis</artifactId>
 </dependency>
```

name: v1.0.5.RELEASE
body: This version adds _URL_ as an option for policies type which uses the request path of the upstream service.

name: v1.0.4.RELEASE
body:
This version fix the issues regarding `redis-cluster`.

More details at https://github.com/marcosbarbero/spring-cloud-starter-zuul-ratelimit/issues/3

name: v1.0.2.RELEASE
body:
This version is standing for make policies optional for each route.

Dependencies upgrade:
- Project Lombok - 1.16.12
- Spring Cloud Netflix - 1.2.3.RELEASE

name: v1.0.1.RELEASE
body:
Upgrade dependencies:
- Lombok: From 1.16.8 to 1.16.10
- Spring Cloud Netflix: From 1.1.4.RELEASE to 1.1.5.RELEASE
